definition: to grow (usually of abstract things)/to yield/to develop
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt

sentences.english: She bid me take life easy, as the grass grows on the weirs.
sentences.chinese: 當青草在河岸滋長的時候，她囑咐我要輕鬆的去生活。

sentences.english: It seems the growth of its arrogance.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎滋長了它的囂張氣焰。

sentences.english: Children such as seedlings, must develop properly, can only germinate grow.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒比如幼苗，必須培養得宜，方能發芽滋長。

sentences.english: Do not let unbelief and bitterness grow inside us.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓不信和苦毒在心中滋長。

sentences.english: Three developments haudio-videoe fed the new declinism.
sentences.chinese: 三小事態滋長了新衰落主義。

sentences.english: The subtext: there's been a recent spike in anti-American sentiment in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 背景是，最近巴基斯坦反對美國的情緒有所滋長。

sentences.english: Spring, the earth beginning come to, the new life starts grow in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 春，大地初醒，新的生命在每個角落開始滋長。

sentences.english: If humans were evacuated, the Earth would flourish.
sentences.chinese: 如果人類撤離淨空，地球將發榮滋長。

sentences.english: Idleness spawns discontent, whereas overwork leads to mental and physical exhaustion .
sentences.chinese: 懶散滋長不滿，而過度工作導致精神和身體的疲勞。

sentences.english: In the meantime, cities'counter-functional and non-functional features are increasing.
sentences.chinese: 城市的反功能性與無功能性也同時滋長。

sentences.english: Give me a field where the unmow'd grass grows.
sentences.chinese: 給我一片田野，那兒不識鐮刀的草兒滋長。

sentences.english: Regularly use of AOKO KOI can effectively prevent algae growth.
sentences.chinese: 只需準時添加錦鯉青子，便能有用地防備藻類滋長。

sentences.english: We should guard against arrogance and conceit.
sentences.chinese: 我們應防止驕傲自滿的情緒滋長。

sentences.english: No one can grow while these sins are present.
sentences.chinese: 當人容讓罪在心中滋長，就不可能在靈裏成長。

sentences.english: Then all the negativity feeds on each other and the animosity grows.
sentences.chinese: 然後所有這些消極性會侵蝕彼此，讓敵意滋長。

sentences.english: If we fail to act, the crisis will grow.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們失敗了，危機將繼續滋長。

definition: hotbed/breeding ground/fig. breeding ground for crimes or sedition
to uphold (e.g. justice or virtue)/to promote
deep roots and vigorous foliage (idiom)/(fig.) well established and growing strongly
inner product/the dot product of two vectors
when things reach an extreme, they can only move in the opposite direction (idiom)
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
